name: Comprehensive Predicate & Action Test
description: Exercises all predicate types and action variants across 3 traffic types: normal UDP, attack UDP, SYN flood. Each phase runs long enough for metrics to accumulate.

phases.name: warmup_normal
phases.description: Normal UDP baseline (port 8888, TTL=64, DF=1). Expect: PASS fires, COUNT R4/R5/R6/R7/R9 tick.

phases.name: udp_attack_1
phases.description: Attack UDP flood (port 9999, TTL=255, DF=0). Expect: RATE-LIMIT fires, COUNT R5/R6/R8 tick.

phases.name: syn_flood_1
phases.description: TCP SYN flood (flags=0x02, TTL=128). Expect: DROP fires, COUNT R8/R9 tick.

phases.name: udp_attack_2
phases.description: Second attack round — confirms rate-limit + counts are consistent.

phases.name: final_calm
phases.description: Final normal baseline — all counters should show accumulated totals.
